newsitem.title: USA: Effective Mgmt inks Korean software pact. [CORRECTED]
newsitem.headline: Effective Mgmt inks Korean software pact. [CORRECTED]

text.p: Effective Management Systems Inc said Tuesday it signed an agreement that expands its distribution relationship with LG-EDS Systems Inc in Korea.

The pact calls for LG-EDS to purchase and distribute more than $2.5 million (corrects from $2.5 billion) worth of EMS's manufacturing software over the next three years. LG-EDS will also become the exclusive distributor of EDS's Time Critical Manufacturing software to Korean companies.
EMS develops software products used in factories to run manufacturing equipment.

LG-EDS, EMS's primary manufacturing software distributor in Korea since 1984, is a joint venture between Korea's LG Group and EDS Inc, America's largest computer-services company. EDS is a subsidiary of Electronic Data Systems Corp of Plano, Texas.
